{"id":554585964,"lang":"java","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1631593985,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/554585964/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {\n        // Variable Sliding window\n        Set<Character> set = new HashSet<Character>();\n        int left = 0;\n        int right = 0;\n        int res = 1;\n        for(right = 0; right < s.length(); right++){\n            char c = s.charAt(right);\n            while(set.contains(c))\n                set.remove(s.charAt(left++));\n            set.add(c);\n            res = Math.max(res, right-left+1);\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n}\n\n// public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {\n//         // brute force O(n^3)\n//         int n = s.length();\n//         int res = 0;\n//         for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){\n//             for(int j = 0; j < n; j++){\n//                 if(check(s,i,j)) res = Math.max(res, j-i+1); // j-i+1 is length of the current substring which ain't got any repeating chars. \n//             }\n//         }\n//         return res;\n//     }\n//     private boolean check(String s, int start, int end){\n//         int[] chars = new int[128];\n//         for(int i = start; i <= end; i++){\n//             char c = s.charAt(i);\n//             chars[c]++;\n//             if(chars[c] > 1) return false;\n//         }\n//         return true;\n//     }","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
